game.title: Retrieve the Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve a legendary artifact hidden deep within the ancient ruins.
game.description: The artifact, known as the Starlight Chalice, is said to grant immense power and wisdom. It has been lost for centuries and is hidden within the long-abandoned temple of the Moon Goddess.
game.reward: 50 gold coins and a magical amulet

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the Moon Goddess's temple.
task.description: The temple is hidden behind a secret waterfall. Be careful not to get caught in its mist.
task.location: The Ancient Ruins, near the old oak tree

task.objective: Solve the puzzle of the ancient pressure plate.
task.description: The plate must be triggered in a specific sequence to unlock the next chamber. Pay attention to the symbols etched into the floor.
task.location: The Temple Chamber, beneath the moonstone pedestal

task.objective: Defeat the temple's guardian and claim the Starlight Chalice.
task.description: The guardian is a powerful entity bound to the temple. It will not give up its treasure easily. You must be brave and cunning to succeed.
task.location: The Treasure Chamber, beneath the altar
